title: 6.10 Lag Spikes
body: Since 6.10 came out. I'm getting ms spikes that are not on my end. Please fix :)

replies.body: Same here, it was like playing with 2 secs lag since 2 days ago. But the ping in the game client said it was like normal ping. It stopped every of my friends playing...Please investigate

I'm having the same issues. Thought i was the only one, guess not. Riot must be having a war with hackers, getting ddos-ed so hard. Hopefully, Riot will solve this issue, soon.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Just got out of a game where I was skipping all over the place the entire time. Ping is normal.
Hopefully this can be fixed a.s.a.p.

Same here, I didn't want to post something about it until I saw someone else do it. It's almost impossible to play {{champion:157}} .

Edit: I live in Oregon, and if the server is in California, I shouldn't be having this problem.

Lag is definitely one of those things that can be tricky to troubleshoot sometimes as there's so many places things could go wrong.  If it's inconsistent lag (lag in some games for some of the time vs. lag in all games all of the time), I'd recommend checking out our [Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) which should be able to look at your network logs and give some more information as to what the potential issue is.

Let me know if it helps!
yall give us this same crap answer every time a patch comes out that screws up ping.

I used the log reader and compared the log a week ago with yesterday. I saw that my ping was the same (200ms from Hong Kong) but packet loss jumped from below 1% a week ago to 20% yesterday. I wonder if it is just Hong Kong issue or what. And when I played ARAM, there was no issue. Package loss was normal.

I found out something that might help.

I've found that if I'm lagging in game and I exit the game, reset my client, and then go back in game. The lag is gone.

I've done this on multiple occasions since the last patch and each time it works perfectly.

Also I'd like to mention that it usually doesn't happen on my first game after freshly starting up the client.

Let me know if this is any use to you, but it seems to be an issue with the client itself.
same. spikes to 200 ping randomly once or twice  a minute
I'm also experiencing this, very badly
mine goes up to 10k at times

Yep, been noticing the same thing, really bad. Just started two days ago. The ping looks fine.  I usually get 60-70 and sometimes spikes to 120, but not game breaking by any means. I play on a lappy over Wi-Fi. Now I know people are going to say that's the reason, but I can be downloading and wife watching Netflix all on the same network and it runs the same. But, I did think it possibly could be on my end. I've been wanting to reformat for a couple months now, just haven't had the time, but being a 3 day weekend, I decided to go forward with it. Updated everything: drivers, graphics card ect... So I get in my first game, (after playing in bots for 20 min. ofc) and it runs perfect. Next game runs good for 10-20 min or so, then boom 2 second delay on movement and abilities. Ping at 67 ms. So, all in all, I wanted to reformat anyhow, but to answer any questions, that did not fix the issue. It doesn't appear that there was something in the background slowing the process. This is purely on riots end and they need to fix it because it sucks. In series now, lost one due to this problem.
6.10 patch giving me lag spikes. there's no way it is on my end, as it has been always normal.  I have a dual band wifi , one of which with 5 gigah (made for gaming)......please fix this asap
